Container.Name: Ark
Container.Overview:
ARK: Survival Evolved - Docker
Docker build for managing an ARK: Survival Evolved server. This image uses Ark Server Tools to manage an ark server. If you use an old volume, get the new arkmanager.cfg in the template directory. Don't forget to use docker pull turzam/ark to get the latest version of the image
Features Easy install (no steamcmd / lib32... to install) Use Ark Server Tools : update/install/start/backup/rcon/mods Easy crontab configuration Easy access to ark config file Mods handling (via Ark Server Tools) Docker stop is a clean stop

Config.Name: Session Name
Config.Description: Name of your ark server (default : Ark Docker)

Config.Name: Ark Server Map
Config.Description: Map of your ark server (default : TheIsland)

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Password of your ark server (default : none)

Config.Name: Ark Admin Password
Config.Description: Admin password of your ark server (default : adminpassword)

Config.Name: Backup On Start
Config.Description: Backup the server when the container is started. 0: no backup (default : 1)

Config.Name: Update on Start
Config.Description: Update the server when the container is started. 0: no update (default : 1)

Config.Name: Backup on Stop
Config.Description: Backup the server when the container is stopped. 0: no backup (default : 0)

Config.Name: Warn on Stop
Config.Description: Warn the players before the container is stopped. 0: no warning (default : 0)

Config.Name: Number of Players
Config.Description: Number of players allowed to connect to the server (default : 70)

Config.Name: Ark Game Mods
Config.Description: Ark Server Game comma delimited mod list (default : null)
